title: Luxurious Oberoi Ranthambhore National Park Wildlife Glamping Tents with Restaurant, Bar & Day Spa
description: Experience the magic of India's wilderness with a luxurious retreat set on the edge of the Ranthambhore Tiger Reserve. Discover the thrill of a jungle safari, or simply relax in your private, air-conditioned tent, adorned with handcrafted furnishings and a freestanding, claw-footed bathtub. Relish authentic Rajasthani cuisine at The Dining Room, or sip on a refreshing drink at the stylish bar. A stone's throw away, discover the 10th-century Ranthambore Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering panoramic views of the surrounding landscape.
location_description: The Oberoi Vanyavilas Wildlife Resort, Ranthambore
offer_address: Ranthambhore Rd, Sawai Madhopur, Rajasthan 322001, India
